original_title: Rod Stewart - It Had to Be You The Great American Songbook
overview: This exclusive one-night only concert features Rod performing over and hour and a half of music from the platinum selling, Grammy nominated, & most talked about album of the year, It Had To Be You The Great American Songbook plus his all time classic hits including Maggie May, Downtown Train, Young Turks, a special bonus recording of It Takes Two and so much more.
title: Rod Stewart - It Had to Be You The Great American Songbook
